messages.subject: Resources, ideas, questions and answers
messages.msgSnippet: A new member wrote I am so glad I joined this group!! It seems that everything that is a concern that crosses my mind turns up as question on this group. If
messages.messageBody:
A new member wrote "I am so glad I joined this group!! It seems that
everything
that is a concern that crosses my mind turns up as question
on this group."

If anyone has questions they're shy to ask, you could search the
archives of this group by clicking at the bottom of any of the group e-
mails, where it says messages and searching.

What's even easier and might take less time reading is this:
http://sandradodd.com/search

or go to Joyce's page
http://joyfullyrejoycing.com
or
http://sandradodd.com/random


Those sites have "best of" unschooling writings collected from over
many years.

This Wednesday there will be a chat on that time when unschooled kids
get older, and think about leaving home, or go. How the parents
handle that time of life is different for unschoolers, too.

http://sandradodd.com/chats/olderkids

Sandra
